channel.title: automation on Development Cheat Sheets
channel.description: Recent content in automation on Development Cheat Sheets

item.title: Ansible
item.description: Ansible provides open-source automation that reduces complexity and runs everywhere.

item.title: Broadlink (Black Bean) Devices
item.description: The Broadlink (RM Mini) black bean is a small universal Infra Red (IR) remote control which connects to and receives commands over WiFi.

item.title: Inventory
item.description: Inventories organize managed nodes in centralized files that provide Ansible with system information and network locations.

item.title: openHAB
item.description: Open Home Automation Bus (openHAB) is an open source home automation software written in Java. It is deployed on premises and connects to devices and services from different vendors.
